title: Silver 5 Unranks?
body: I made it out of bronze into silver recently but for some reason I keep having unranked players in my game who have no idea what to even do and feed them selves, is there any way to stop these unranked people from coming into my games?

replies.body: Raising MMR is not an option, I was unranked few games before and matching up with plat+Gold Elo my first 3 matches was with them so I don't think its based on MMR

Nope dont think so, pretty sure you have to raise your MMR and you'll be fine.
Also if you are, dont queue with someone decently lower than you.
